name: zkslr
fullText:
项目推荐:

Google Cloud Universal Ledger 项目 @GoogleCloud

Google Cloud Universal Ledger (GCUL) 是 Google Cloud 推出的 Layer 1 区块链平台，专为金融机构设计，旨在提供高性能、可靠中立的区块链基础设施。该项目于 2025 年 8 月正式公布细节，目前正处于 alpha

name: Polymarket
fullText: BREAKING: House members say they now have the support to force a vote on the Epstein Files being released.
